data.prayer: Father, encourage the 234,276 believers in South Dakota to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of South Dakota, United States
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 234,276 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in South Dakota, United States that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of South Dakota, United States.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Azerbaijani, Azeri Turk people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in South Dakota, United States today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of South Dakota, United States the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.section_summary:
the state of South Dakota, United States has a population of 887,200.

We estimate South Dakota has 234,276 people who might know Jesus, 444,351 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 208,573 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of South Dakota, United States.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
